name: Lunchtime Rush
description:
It's LUNCHTIME-RUSHHHH! The famous Japanese lunch time rush is back! Students running down the hallway, teachers are scolding here and there, and GRAB YOUR FOOD BEFORE THE BELL RINGS. Get through the chaos and secure your food!

What to do
  • Go to the stalls to get the food before the time runs out! Then bring it back to your class
  • Don't collide with anyone! You will lose time
  • A teacher (Red cone) will stop you if you RUN in front of him!
  • Your best friends (Green cone) will stop you if they see you!
Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Hold SHIFT to sprint
  • SPACE to GRAB FOOD
Developer
  • @zheister - Howard Zhang - In-Game Art, Title/Ending Music, SFX, Character Design
  • @metalboyrick - Rick Zhang - Programming, Level Design, Character Design
